### API Reference

# Components API (v1)

## Legacy component parameters

This documents v1 component APIs. For current component documentation, see [Components API](page:components-api).

### DocSection (v1)

Basic parameters only:
- max_width: Content width

### Header (v1)

- sticky: Fixed position
- (No search, locale, or version support)

V2 adds extensive new parameters and features to all components.
